ProductInfo.Features:
GW3016HD: Professional 16 Channel H.264 960H/FD1 DVR with HDMI & VGA. FD1/CIF/960H/Q960H recording, 16ch 960H Full Channels Real-time Playback. iPhone, Android Viewing, PTZ Control
GW808H: 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Outdoor/Indoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Vari focal Lens, 42PCS Infrared LED, 114 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof
GW807H: 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Indoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Vari focal Lens, 30PCS Infrared LED, 65 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination
Package Includes: GW3016HD DVR with 8TB HD; GWLED19IN - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 8 x GW808H - 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Camera; 8 x GW807H - 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Camera
1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box; 16 x Power pigtail (GW082); 16 x Power pigtail (GW132); 32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 16CHE7 Manual Vari-Focal Lens Security Camera System (White/Black)
